<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Address BRC-20 Balance</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/brc20/{ticker}/addresses/{address}/balances"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get BRC-20 balance by address and ticker.
